attDef.desc: specifies the applicable multimedia internet mail extension (MIME) media type
attDef.valDesc: The value should be a valid MIME media type

remarks.p: This attribute class provides attrbiutes for describing a computer resource, typically available over the internet, according to standard taxonomies. At present only a single taxonomy is supported, the Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions Media Type system. This system of typology of media types is defined by the Internet Engineering Task Force in RFC 2046. The list of types is maintained by the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority.
